title: Quest for oil
creator_credit: Christopher McCullough, Frank Bagnall and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Oil exploration in Australia and the development of important oil and gas discoveries, showing the productive fields and test drilling in progress. Offshore drilling on the Gippsland Shelf field by the floating rig Glomar III is shown in detail.
creator_credit_for_label: Christopher McCullough, Frank Bagnall and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
